sense.def:
To have reservations about something
pomeni, da nismo prepričani, ali je nekaj povsem dobro oziroma pravilno ali ne.

seg.quote: I have reservations about the desirability of such a change.
They accepted the plan without reservation.

sense.def:
To make a reservation
pomeni poskrbeti, da bodo za nas v restavraciji prihranili mizo ali v hotelu sobo.

seg.quote: I will make the reservation for seven thirty.
